memberdef.definition: const std :: unordered_map< std :: string, int > transfer::get_activation
memberdef.name: get_activation

memberdef.definition: std :: function< float(const float &) > transfer::activate(const int &active)
memberdef.name: activate

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to set the desired activation function (returned as pointer to function) starting from its "name" in the enum. If the input integer is not in the enum range a nullptr is returned.

parameterdescription.para: Integer from the enum activation types.

memberdef.definition: std :: function< float(const float &) > transfer::gradient(const int &active)
memberdef.name: gradient

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to set the desired gradient function (returned as pointer to function) starting from its "name" in the enum. If the input integer is not in the enum range a nullptr is returned.
